Plot: A teenager teams up with the daughter of young adult horror author R. L. Stine after the writer's imaginary demons are set free on the town of Madison, Delaware.
Title: Goosebumps
Writer: Darren Lemke (screenplay), Scott Alexander (story), Larry Karaszewski (story), R.L. Stine ("Goosebumps" books)
Actors: Jack Black, Dylan Minnette, Odeya Rush, Ryan Lee
